data.persona: I am the local blacksmith. I repair items made of iron as well as create new ones. I am frequently covered in soot as my job requires a lot of ash and heat.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Armory.
Swords and armor line the wall of the grand armory. No rust is to be found on any of the weapons. The armorer's forge bellows smoke and fire, day and night, as the king's army is getting fitted out for it's next campaign.
There's some chain mail, a dagger, some weapons, and some swords here.
A knight and a squire are here.

You are carrying a hammer, wearing some gloves, some overalls, and some boots, and wielding an iron, a sword, and a blacksmith's hammer.

data.short_motivation: I want to fix the chain mail.
data.mid_motivation: I want to make the knight happy with my work.
data.long_motivation: I want to become known as the most skilled blacksmith in all the kingdom.
